title: (08450) Llinars del Vallès - 90 Diseminado Diseminados
description: We spent two days very well and calm. They are the facilities of the Mogent colony house and they are very good. There is drinking water, showers, toilets, a small playground for the children and picnic tables. They can also access motorhomes. Children under 13 years old do not pay. From the 3rd person over 12 years old, they pay. Very friendly owners. They told us that soon they want to put gray and black water drainage, at the moment they do not have. For the electricity you pay separately. To go you have to book. They have WhatsApp. Since June 2021 they already have for gray and black water!

title: (08459) Sant Antoni de Vilamajor - 18 Carrer Santa Marta
title_short: (08459) Sant Antoni de Vilamajor - 18 Carrer Santa Marta

title: (08479) Barcelona - Carretera del Turó de l'Home
title_short: (08479) Barcelona - Carretera del Turó de l'Home
description: Beautiful corner in the woods, at the foot of the road, before reaching the Turó de l'Home car park where you can only park from 8am to 8pm. Two camper vans are sure to fit. 1 AC, I find it difficult because there is like a small rsmoit / mound to park in the grove. NEW NOTE. In the middle of the morning a man came and told me that you couldn't park here. I asked him if he was a park authority and he said yes. I told him to identify himself and he laughed. He told me to leave or they would come and fine me. I told him that I was not going to go, that I was not camping and that I would call park information. I called park information, told them where I was and they told me that if there was no prohibition sign, I could park without problems. It is true that after a while the Mossos d'Escuadra passed just ahead and told me absolutely nothing.

name: Can pau nadal

title: (17400) Breda - 4 Carrer Baixada Vent

title: (08479) - Carretera del Turó de l'Home
description: Large and flat esplanade. It is a detour from the main road. You can spend the night without problem during day and night. Near a route to visit the turo de l'home. No services

name: Montseny Campers' Association (AAM)
title: (08458) Montseny Campers' Association (AAM)
description:
ONLY BOOKINGS 1 HOUR IN ADVANCE. Entry is not possible or permitted without a reservation. ⚠️ Contact via email or WhatsApp recommended. Telephone also possible. Albert replies quickly!

The contribution is 100% intended for the conservation of the flora and fauna of the site and for the promotion of the natural environment in which you are staying, the "Biosphere Reserve of Montseny".

Services: All services are very good and well maintained.

Security: The site is under video surveillance and can only be accessed via an entrance gate with a code. (Albert knows you're there before you set up your camper.)

Registration: You ask for the desired period. Then you get all the information, e.g. via WhatsApp. Then he only needs the information about which vehicle you are driving (easiest: a picture of the vehicle with a recognizable license plate via WhatsApp).

BE SURE TO USE GPS COORDINATES!
Thanks very much!

title: (17400) Breda - 4 Avinguda Mossèn Pere Ribot

title_short: (08479) La Costa de Montseny - 152 Carretera de las Costas

title: (08470) Barcelona - 155 Diseminado Afueras
description: La Guardiola esplai area. There are public services (bathrooms) with toilet paper. They are not always open, but it does not indicate hours. There are also plenty of concrete tables and a drinking fountain, as well as recycling bins. There are no barbecues. There is the possibility of starting routes from here. There is space to park about 10 cars - vans. Parking space is very tight for a large motorhome. In the car park, it does NOT indicate that overnight stays are prohibited (parking from 8:00 p.m. to 8:00 a.m.). We were having breakfast and there were two vans staying overnight. It is next to the road, but at night there is no traffic (after 7.30 some cars and motorcycles begin to pass).

title: (08479) Barcelona - 20 BV-5114

Private place.

title_short: (08359) Sant Iscle de Vallalta - 5 Carrer de la Generalitat

We spent a Saturday afternoon and night without problems, there was no more ac, only a tourist and us. Very calm and pleasant atmosphere. Without services, but perfect for overnight. Half of the terrain is leveled, the other half with a sensitive slope. Few places for ac. There is a water fountain nearby. Access to the town and its shops walking, very close. Beach a few kms, 15 minutes approx by car.

title: (08479) - Carretera del Turó de l'Home

title: (08360) Canet de Mar - Camí de Pedracastell
title_short: (08360) Canet de Mar - Camí de Pedracastell
description: Mirador de la Creu, ideal place after a day spent on the beach and a night spent in the forest in silence. During the day, there are movements of cars, motorcycles and people coming to walk. Without services. Driving skills are required to access the track. Steep slope of the earth. Better 4x4. I climbed the wheel with the Kangoo several times.

title: (08445) Cànoves - 6 Avinguda Josep Crous
description:
Forbidden for motorhomes from 00h until 07h.

Large parking lot to visit the town, with good restaurants, bakery farm of 10, little shops and pizzeria opposite. Next to it, a very cool children's park, a sports track and a great skate park for children. Very cool fountain below the parking lot. From the right side of the town square, the route to the Vallforners reservoir starts along the stupendous stream, passing through bridges and wooden walkways, where you can get soaked along the way. The bad thing is that there is not much shade in summer in this car park. A site 10. There are no emptying services or water.

title: (08360) Canet de Mar -
description:
Nice place in the middle of the pines, magnificent view, a little passage of walkers in the morning, but otherwise the place is very quiet !!
Attention, a high car is highly recommended (our Toyota Rav4 was perfect for climbing the steep and bumpy paths)

name: Camping Les Piscines de Montseny
title: (08469) Camping Les Piscines de Montseny
description: A wonderful place in the middle of a natural setting. Breathing clean air in times of pandemic is a luxury. Campsite with a water pool that runs directly from the River. With access to the river and a picnic area with barbecues. Very shady areas. We will repeat for sure. It is not the cheapest but it is worth it.

title: (08469) Montseny - Unnamed road
description: Parking indicated direction Matagalls to the sports area. Terra de gravel and level asphalt with fans and trees. Spectaculars you dress Montseny. Apartat from the main road, very quiet.

title: (08445) Barcelona - 75 Diseminado Casas Campo
description: Paid parking, you can NOT stay overnight, hike to Sui and Samont

title: (08469) Montseny -
description: Quiet place surrounded by nature next to the river. You can bathe in the river and at night you can see the stars. We don't know if it's legal to park here, but they haven't told us anything ...

title: (08450) Llinars del Vallès - Unnamed Road
description: Free parking with easy access both with tourism, van, caravan or 4x4! Sito very quiet until 7: 30-8: 00 in the morning! Fit about 6-7 large vehicles!

title: (08450) Llinars del Vallès - 150 Carrer la Tecnologia
title_short: (08450) Llinars del Vallès - 150 Carrer la Tecnologia
description:
Perfect level parking to be with the camper, it is very empty, it is quite large, approximately 20 spaces, it is a very quiet or brown polygon, if you go by the AP-7 (highway) and you want to rest better here rather than in a service area, much quieter and you only deviate 5 minutes from the highway, it also has good lighting

There is no height limit

There are large spaces for trucks or buses in case you go with a large motorhome

Mercadona less than 5min and laundry less than 7

title_short: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - 8 Carrer Ausias March

address.street: 49 Carrer de la Mare de Déu del Pilar

name: Masia Can Cervera
title: (08469) Masia Can Cervera
description:
Mountain campsite in the heart of Montseny. Camping in a natural setting with large lawns or wooded areas. With pool and barbecue area.

DIRECTIONS:
Ignore GPS navigators. It guides you on the shortest route, but not on the route in the best condition. The GPS directs you to kilometer point 14 (Bv-5301) and takes you right through the town of Montseny on a bad road. This is impossible with a caravan and much more difficult with a vehicle. You will find the detour to the campsite directly at kilometer point 15 (Bv-5301) on the right-hand side. From here you have to follow a 2 km path (almost entirely paved) until you reach the campsite.

title: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - 16 Carrer Miquel Martí i Pol
title_short: (08396) Sant Cebrià de Vallalta - 16 Carrer Miquel Martí i Pol
description: Great esplanade in the same town next to the sports center

title: (08440) Cardedeu - 41 Passeig la Riera

title: (08396) Sant Pol de Mar - Camí de Can Patxoca
title_short: (08396) Sant Pol de Mar - Camí de Can Patxoca
description: Dirt road of little traffic of people. Quiet area a few minutes from paved road.

description: Large family campsite where quality takes precedence over open overcrowding.

address.street: Ctra. Sta Mª de Palautordera - Seva km 20

title: (08440) Barcelona - 61 Carrer Orfeó Català
description: On the outskirts of Cardedeu, there is always a place to park, it feels safe, Mercadona close by

title: (08350) Arenys de Mar - 48 Riera del Pare Fita
title_short: (08350) Arenys de Mar - 48 Riera del Pare Fita
description: It is the end of a street in the Arenys de Munt urbanization, you can sleep peacefully, there is shade and silence

title: (08319) Dosrius - 9 B-510
description: Public parking next to the village. Very calm. Supermarket 2 min.

title: (08360) Canet de Mar - 41 Passeig Misericòrdia
description: Drinking fountain with high flow

title: (08360) Canet de Mar - 34 Passeig Nostra Senyora Misericòrdia
title_short: (08360) Canet de Mar - 34 Passeig Nostra Senyora Misericòrdia
description: Spot in height next to a church (which does not ring). Very calm. A few young people in the evening but very discreet. A few dog walkers. We spent one night there with no problem.

title: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - 33 Carrer del Gers
title_short: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - 33 Carrer del Gers
description: Free sand parking in front of a company (industrial area next to a water court). Ideal to spend a night in the calm and the freshness of the trees (shade accessible by motorhome). Attention, the parking fills in the early morning hours of employees' vehicles. No service.

title: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - 12 Carrer Sant Galderic
title_short: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - 12 Carrer Sant Galderic
description: Service station with free water tap available between the vacuum cleaners. Really great…

title: (08469) Montseny - GIV-5114
description: Parking in the middle of the mountain view nice pose lunch we must be able to sleep there

title: (08350) Arenys de Mar - 1 Carrer Rial Llarg
title_short: (08350) Arenys de Mar - 1 Carrer Rial Llarg
description: Reasonable size parking area near McDonald’s with bars and restaurants supermarkets petrol stations and is generally quiet with a view of the sea

title: (17450) Hostalric - 24 Via Romana
description: Municipal parking in the center of the city, near the wall and restaurants and shops, very shady area

name: Camping Marcos
title: (08350) Camping Marcos
description: Clean and well maintained family run campsite.

name: Càmping El Toro Azul
title: (08360) Càmping El Toro Azul
description:
Canet de Mar, 3 N-2.
El Toro Azul family campsite. At the foot of the beach, 1 km walk from the train to reach Barcelona.

name: Càmping Victòria
title: (08360) Càmping Victòria
description: Warm campsite, the staff is friendly, the camper pitches are removed from the center of the campsite with reserved access, the toilets are nearby for the pitches, the restaurant is not bad either, it's up to you

title: (08350) Arenys de Mar - 33B Avinguda del Portinyol
title_short: (08350) Arenys de Mar - 33B Avinguda del Portinyol
description: Beautiful place overlooking the port of Arenys de Mar. In the middle of an urbanization but with incredible views of the sea. Less than 1 km from all services for ac.

title: (17401) El Colls -
description: Place in the middle of nature next to the road. Very calm. It is located at an intersection of dirt roads but you can park without getting in the way. There are hardly any vehicles. It is one of the few places in the area where there is some mobile coverage. Access can be tricky but it's worth it. The dirt track is narrow for most of the way. With L2H2 there is no problem. But I do not recommend larger vehicles such as motorhomes. The inconvenience is if you find a vehicle in front of you. If you go two, I recommend that one go to the destination to prevent another vehicle from getting on.

name: Camping la Maresma
title: (08395) Camping la Maresma
description: Small campsite just 800m from the beach

name: Càmping Costa Dorada
title: (08360) Càmping Costa Dorada
description: Small and very familiar campsite, suitable for a camper van, the owner Gemma has helped us with all possible questions. Two adults, who rested and two children who did not stop bathing in the pool, in accordance with the new coronavirus measures. Clean sinks and clean showers. We will repeat on the safe route. From one night, let's go to be two because of the tranquility that was breathed.Two minutes from Tot Camping Canet physical store ,,, change the auxiliary battery that was failing me and continue the route super happy

title: (08360) Canet de Mar - 2 Carrer Drassanes de Pla
title_short: (08360) Canet de Mar - 2 Carrer Drassanes de Pla
description: Free parking near the sea with water views.

name: Camping Globo Barcelona
title: (08360) Camping Globo Barcelona
description:
Canet de Mar, 32 Carrer de les Drassanes del Pla.
 1st category, very clean, generous pitches, low price close to Barcelona compared to prices in the area, French speaking staff. beautiful swimming pool supervised by lifeguard, surveillance of the campsite by security guard, quiet place.

address.street: 32 Carrer de les Drassanes del Pla

title: (17401) Arbúcies - Passeig de Palacaguïna
description: 8 stone tables to eat next to a road with very little traffic. A few meters away there is a parking area where you can leave your vehicle.

title: (08469) - 2 Diseminado Sant Marcal
description:
Parking next to the top of Sant Marçal, better than the others. One is galazota and the other is small and unbalanced. Next to it, there is a path to a hill with a cross.
==
Aparkalekua Sant Marçal gainaren ondoan, besteak baino hobeagoa. Bat galazota dago eta bestea txikia eta ezorekatua dago. Alboan bidexka bat dago gurutzea duen tontortxu batera.

title: (17401) Arbúcies - 4 Passeig de Palacaguïna
description: Asphalt parking with abandoned services (drinking water and sewers do not work). Only emptying of grays. It is next to a stream, a quiet place for one night.

title: (08469) Montseny - BV-5114
description: We spend a night at this point, it is the beginning of the road that goes up to the Matagalls. We spent the night alone without problem, being a very busy place for hiking at 7 in the morning there was already movement

title: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - Carrer Bonavista
title_short: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - Carrer Bonavista
description: Nice places to take a break or spend a night. With access to the beach less than 50 m walk that goes under the national. (See the pictures). We spent one night on this car park and it's ok, just the national passing by. Especially practical if you have a large vehicle.

title: (17401) Arbúcies - Ctra. de Santa Fe
description: Free parking inside the sports area. Very quiet to spend the night. No services.

title: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - 31 BV-5128
description: Parking next to a soccer field. Free weekends and holidays. We slept two nights with no problem. No  prohibition sign. 5 min walk from the beach

title: (08394) Sant Vicenç de Montalt - 29 Passeig del Marques de Casa Riera
title_short: (08394) Sant Vicenç de Montalt - 29 Passeig del Marques de Casa Riera
description: Parking along the beach. Free off the season.

address.street: 29 Passeig del Marques de Casa Riera

title: (17401) Arbúcies - GI-543
description: From Monday to Thursday it is a good option to spend the night, other days not feasible for a medium or large AC, due to the way cars are parked, on the ramp and in all corners. Another difficulty of the 100m of access are the gullies formed by the water. Having said that; There are a variety of routes, a park with a children's zip line, a restaurant with a good menu next door, a fountain, a calisthenics park, recycling bins and on the other side of the stream, paddle tennis and tennis courts.

name: Restaurant El Molí de les Pipes
title: (17401) Restaurant El Molí de les Pipes
title_short: (17401) Restaurant El Molí de les Pipes
description: Free parking for a restaurant that was an old flour mill, with a Romanesque-style bridge from the 11th century, next to a river in the middle of nature. It has routes and trails for walking or cycling. The restaurant is open from Wednesday to Sunday. The toilet during the week will be closed.

title: (08392) Sant Andreu de Llavaneres - 28 Carretera Nacional II
title_short: (08392) Sant Andreu de Llavaneres - 28 Carretera Nacional II
description:
Small parkinglot on a waste area, next to the road, opposite the harbour. 
Nice wiew over a small boats harbour and the sea,
near restaurants and bars in the harbour.  
no facilities available.

title: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08395) Sant Pol de Mar - Unnamed Road
description:
Free water point.
Good parking facilities around.

title: (08370) Pineda de Mar - 28 Carrer Lloret
description:
Small platform at the turn of the road, beautiful view of the sea and the city. Quiet and calm corner, little car traffic.
perfect for one night.

title: (08304) Mataró - 17 Carrer Riu Ebre
description: Parking under the viewpoint of the Mataró forest park. The viewpoint has better views but it is very crowded and this parking lot is much quieter and has 2 levels. no parking from 10pm to 7am. Then in the morning you can go up to see the viewpoint and there are tables for breakfast with good views.

title: (17452) Massanes - 17 Carrer Josep Pla
description: Undeveloped industrial zone. Not nice but ok for one night. Quiet impasse.

title: (08304) Mataró - 30 Carrer del Cami de la Cornisa
title_short: (08304) Mataró - 30 Carrer del Cami de la Cornisa
description: Ascent to a parking lot with exceptional views of the city of Mataró and the port, suitable for all vehicles. Maximum length 8m. About 20 places to park. There are rubbish bins, tables and some route through the area.

address.street: 30 Carrer del Cami de la Cornisa

title: (08520) Marata - 531 Barri Marata
description: Green car park. There are no services.

title: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 6F Polígon Can Massaguer Nord
title_short: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 6F Polígon Can Massaguer Nord
description: Parking at the Roca Village shopping center. There are several car parks, some are open during the night.

title: (17451) Sant Feliu de Buixalleu - Unnamed Road
title_short: (17451) Sant Feliu de Buixalleu - Unnamed Road
description: Tip top straight, not far from a restaurant and a small chapel, very nice hiking area. It's on a street, but hardly any traffic.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 144 Carrer Llavaneres
description: Parking with beautiful views, we stopped here after looking for a quiet place. Be careful the climb is tough.

title: (17452) Massanes - Carrer Pi
description: I live in the area and I see many motorhomes that park and spend a night. It pretended to be an industrial estate but there is only one for companies. space to maneuver some shadows ... although the trees are small. no services 20 minutes from the beach .. Blanes 30 min from the mountain ... Montseny

title: (08304) Mataró - 72 Carrer dels Remences
description: It is a car park in the Valverich industrial estate, but it does not have a gauge. it has good views. there is no limitation for AC.. it is very close to the c32 highway. easy access. away from the city center

title: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 12R Carrer Sector Santa Agnès
title_short: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 12R Carrer Sector Santa Agnès
description: Very quiet parking lot in a residential area. There are also a number of parking spaces in the side streets. We spent the night here and felt very safe. Our motorhome of 6m fit into the parking space without any problems.

title: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 1E Polígon Can Massaguer Nord
title_short: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 1E Polígon Can Massaguer Nord
description: Parking for AC in La Roca Village shopping center. Parking during business hours.

name: Càmping Bonavista
title: (08395) Càmping Bonavista
description: Calella, Carrer de Sant Jaume. Campsite Bonavista. Family campsite. Lots of trees, close to the sea, easy access by road. Very nice staff and welcome. We will definitely come back for weekends.

name: CAMPING ROCA GROSSA & BUNGALOW
title: (08370) CAMPING ROCA GROSSA & BUNGALOW
description: Camping Roca Grossa is a terraced campsite, a small train takes you up and down the campsite. It has a restaurant, grocery, swimming pool, tennis, toilets. Plot of size with more or less seen on the sea. Access to the sea (small cove with small pebble and not sand) is made by bridges to cross road and train. pay wifi

name: Camping BARCELONA
title: (08304) Camping BARCELONA
description: Camping Barcelona offers all the services of a top-of-the-range campsite. Private shuttle from the campsite to the center of Mataro (Barcelona) seven days a week. Ticket service for all the tourist attractions in the city. Camping Barcelona is located on the shores of the Mediterranean, with a magnificent view of the sea. Activities for adults and the swimming pool are practiced throughout the season. Most plots are very shaded and range from 60 to 140 square meters and are ideal for caravans of all sizes, even 15 meter American caravans. All plots have free high quality Wi-Fi, 10-16 amp electrical connection and almost all have a water point with drain. The entire campsite is suitable for people with reduced mobility. The bungalow park offers a range of very comfortable, fully equipped accommodation with free Wi-Fi.

title: (08370) Calella - N-II
description: Viewpoint of Platja de Roca Grossa, quiet place with a magnificent view of the sea. Night prohibited on the coast. Camping prohibited, please do not unpack anything.

title: (08370) Calella - N-II
description: Small rest area by the road, with splendid views. A little road noise. No camping, do not unpack anything, thank you!

name: AREA DE PERNOCTA  - CERRADO POR REFORMAS
title: (08520) AREA DE PERNOCTA - CERRADO POR REFORMAS
title_short: (08520) AREA DE PERNOCTA  - CERRADO POR REFORMAS
description:
ATTENTION: Closed for renovations as of may 7, 2023
Very well connected area, easily accessible with comfortable and spacious pitches. Cleaning area, emptying gray water and chemical toilet, charging drinking water and electricity. Maximum stay 24 hours. 20 seats. € 10 night. Attention during office hours: 9:30 AM to 1:30 PM / 4:00 PM at 8:30 PM. Bus stop at 500m. Mechanical motorhome workshop at 500m. Restaurants, cinemas and shops within 3 km In this area are allowed: motorhomes, motorhomes and prepared vans.
WhatsApp reservations

address.street: Ctra. C-251  Km 3,5 (rotonda, rond point, roundabout)

title: (08370) Calella - 1 Zona Afores
description: Large, very flat sandy parking lot, 300 meters from the beach and 100 from the Calella lighthouse, with GR paths. And close to the population, camping is NOT allowed, be responsible with the environment, please, if they give us access, let's take care of it!

title: (08370) Calella - 3 Carretera d'Hortsavinyà
description: Free unsupervised parking lot have taken the parking lot as a resting place for the market. Way to the beach approx. 1.5 km. Many cozy places between bamboo where you can stand. Motorhomes are not allowed other night there are lights and dark shaded areas with bamboo.

title: (08495) -
description: Parking of the paddle court, at night there is no one, although there are some lights on the court sleep well

title: (08370) Calella - 94 Carrer de Sant Jaume
description: Automatic launderette next to a petrol station.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 89 Carrer Segrià
description: Place with a lot of space to park with vans with a view of the sea, shade and quiet

title: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - Unnamed Road
description: The place is quiet, away from all the main roads but easy to access. Only cyclists pass by here. There are small walks around but I didn't explore much as I was just looking for a quiet night outside of Mataró. Up and down this road are a few setbacks for more RVs.

title: (08520) Corró d'Avall - 737 Diseminado Corro de Vall
title_short: (08520) Corró d'Avall - 737 Diseminado Corro de Vall
description: Small plain at the entrance to the cemetery. The council bans air conditioning throughout the city and all its neighborhoods.

title: (17406) - GIV-5201
description: Parking without services at the start of excursions / treekings.

title: (08495) Fogars de la Selva - 1 Casa Nova Planas
title_short: (08495) Fogars de la Selva - 1 Casa Nova Planas
description: Picnic area with tables next to a church. There is a bicycle lane called the Tourdera.

title: (08593) Tagamanent -
description: Parking de tierra al lado del restaurante. Bonito lugar donde poder hacer rutas de senderismo y comer en el restaurante.

title: (08559) El Brull - BV-5301
description: Nature area and away from the car park. From here you can start the route to Matagalls. Nice views from the parking lot. Parking, overnight and camping forbidden from 8:00 p.m. to 8:00 a.m.

title: (08530) La Garriga - 130 Carrer dels Banys
description: Ecolaundry

title: (08530) La Garriga - 3 Lloc Riera Malhivern
description: The ten-space car park is located in the southern area of La Garriga, next to the N152 road that connects to Granollers. The services consist of gray water and waste water emptying and water filling. The pitch is in a quiet location 10 minutes walk from the village. In the area there are two playgrounds and two fountains, all next to the Masia Can Terres, supermarket and laundry nearby.

title: (08310) Argentona - 5 Ronda Ponent
description: Quiet street in the upper part of the city, where you can park and sleep peacefully. Good visits Argentona and the mountain. Zone for dogs right in front. A very calm

title: (08530) La Garriga - 63Z Plaça Diseminados
description: Ideal area to eat and rest. It has tables and stone benches, barbecues, chiringuito, children's play area and plenty of pine trees.

title: (08559) El Brull - BV-5301
description: parking spot

title: (08301) Mataró - Av. del Maresme
description: Parking along the railway line opposite the nautical center, possibility of spending the night without problem, no prohibition sign. On the other hand noisy by the passage of the trains. Access to the beach at 50m. Nice city to stay there for 1 day.

title: (08520) - 392 Avinguda Llerona
description: Parking located in Llerona (Les Franqueses del Valles) I have spent one night and no problem very quiet place

title: (08530) La Garriga - 13-15 Carrer de l'Abadessa Emma
title_short: (08530) La Garriga - 13-15 Carrer de l'Abadessa Emma
description: Clean laundry with nice operator. It even has 1 special washing machine in which you can wash "dog stuff". Coin changer available.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 23P Passeig de la Costa Brava
title_short: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 23P Passeig de la Costa Brava
description: Ample ground parking. Many parking lots, close to the center.

title: (08530) La Garriga - 92F Carrer del Mil·lenari de Catalunya
title_short: (08530) La Garriga - 92F Carrer del Mil·lenari de Catalunya
description: Parking along the road without circulation, very quiet. One option if the area is full, the police sent us here.

title: (08520) Barcelona - 308 Avinguda Llerona
description: It is the parking of the park of Falgar I la Verneda, very large with many games for children, a lake and a bird's-eye viewpoint.  Pass the Congost River to the side.  (The Police do not allow camping or overnight).

title: (08530) La Garriga - 82 Carrer Can Basal
description: It consists of an open field, practically in the center of the town of La Garriga ... Nearby there are parks for children, a gas station, bike path, paths towards the mountain, ... If you walk about 500 meters you will reach the center of the town, where it is always very lively ... there are shops of all kinds and bars / restaurants. In summer, at the end of July / beginning of August it is usually the biggest party, and the parties are just held in this field, just in case, if it falls in those times consult the website of the town hall.

title: (08530) La Garriga - 268 Passeig del Congost
description: Parking bordering the river. Information point very close, there they inform you of activities in the town and routes to do in the area. If the Ac area is full, it is a good choice. There is vehicle traffic. Saturdays a little less space, there is a weekly market next and the car parks are occupied

title: (08302) Mataró - 100 Passeig del Callao
description: Drinking water fountain 5m from the car park between the road and Mataró beach. Perfect for filling jerry cans. Easy access for a van or a motorhome if there is room.

title: (08310) Argentona - 39 Urbanització Can Serra de Lladó
title_short: (08310) Argentona - 39 Urbanització Can Serra de Lladó
description: Parking area next to the road. Not very busy. Quiet to spend a night if it catches you en route.

name: Camping Caballo de Mar
title: (08397) Camping Caballo de Mar
description:
Camping Caballo de Mar. It is not a large campsite but it has all the services of a large campsite without crowds. Loading and unloading of water. Beach 1 minute away and close to Calella and Pineda de Mar.
Swimming pool, water slides, children's pool, sports area and entertainment.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 13 Carrer Alonso Cano
title_short: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 13 Carrer Alonso Cano
description: Located in the hills, great views of the city and the sea! At the top and at the bottom of a small residential area! Super quiet, the birds sing ... there are even mountain trails departures! Certainly inaccessible in high season! There can be 2/3 places for maximum vans.

title: (08303) Mataró - 284 Avinguda de Puig i Cadafalch
title_short: (08303) Mataró - 284 Avinguda de Puig i Cadafalch
description: D’ara gas station with Lpg

title: (08303) Mataró - 39 Carrera d'Argentona
description: Land parking without services, large parking area

title: (08521) Bellavista - 92 Carrer Orient
description: It is a parking lot, it is not controlled but it is very quiet and we spent the night and nobody said anything to us and nobody bothered us. It is in the same town there are neighbors next to it and it looks like a safe place

title: (08302) Mataró - 13 Carrer Joan Larrea
description: Self-service laundry. 3 dryers of 15min. Around there are supermarkets, bank, pharmacy

title: (08520) Corró d'Avall - s/n Camí Antic de Vic
title_short: (08520) Corró d'Avall - s/n Camí Antic de Vic
description: Parking places asphalted at the top with fountain and tree area in the shade. (The Police does not allow sleeping)

title: (08530) La Garriga - 1 Plaça Ibera
description: Source of drinking water and parking space.

name: Camping Bellsol
title: (08397) Camping Bellsol
description:
Pineda de Mar, 38 Passeig Maritim.
Campsite Bell Sol. short stopover in this campsite with our 2 young children. We were put towards the bottom, very quiet, medium sized parking spot. Big swimming pool, we don't have time for all activities. But all services available. the beach at 100 m. One downside, the traffic lanes are narrow, especially for turning... but with a good driver (motorhome 7 m long by 3 m high) and patience, you get to your destination!

name: Camping El Camell
title: (08397) Camping El Camell
description: Family campsite, pleasant, very good reception and very friendly. They solve any problems you may have. Near the beach.

title: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 1Z Carrer de Sant Sadurní
title_short: (08430) La Roca del Vallès - 1Z Carrer de Sant Sadurní
description: Open space to park and spend the night without problems with access from the road, spacious and quite quiet place with a small stream next to where you can walk with pets, right in front of a Caprabo supermarket, 250m from restaurants for lunch / dinner.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 24P Lloc Sector PP1
title_short: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 24P Lloc Sector PP1
description: Very large free car park with no bans to date. No shade. A few steps from the sea and even if the railway line no noise. No service but very quiet. The pedestrian street is 600m away

name: Camping Enmar
title: (08397) Camping Enmar
description:
Camping enmar. Very good staff at the reception. Good pool, nice parcels but sometimes narrow paths. Small supermarket. Sanitary makes a clear impression. Not far from the beach. Open from 07/03/21 to 01/10/21 for next year 07/03/22 to 01/11/22
New: heated swimming pool during the months of low/mid season.

address.street: Avinguda Nuestra Señora de la Mercè

title: (08590) Figaró-Montmany - 10 Carrer Ramir Delgado
description: Spring source, fresh and pure, good access at the foot of the source with a well paved road

title: (08530) L'Ametlla del Vallès - Unnamed Road
description:
Nice quiet spot to park during the day or spend the night. Very few locals people pass by on the next morning. No services. Close to l'atmella village, you can slightly hear the highway.
The access is through a dusty road that doesn't appear in google maps as a road. Easy access even for big vans.

title: (08397) Pineda de Mar - 24 Carrer Tarragona
description:
Access only by online registration on our website.

Only for motorhomes.

Guarded area in the city center with all services (electricity, water, gray and black water, wifi, toilets and showers) 50m from the beach. Entrance of vehicles from 5 p.m. Reception: Monday to Saturday from 10 a.m. to 11 a.m. and from 5 p.m. to 7 p.m.

title: (08317) Argentona - 22 Carrer Aquença
description: Small car park for about 6 vans on the roadside. Quiet place, I spent the night alone and without any disturbance. From 9 o'clock the cyclists and the odd car start. Little crowded area.

title: (08302) Mataró - 129 Avinguda del Maresme
description: Parking during the day, you cannot spend the night. Only 100 meters away there is a sandy beach for people and another small fenced beach for dogs. The first hour is free (2 hours in winter). Until you get there, you pass the train tracks through a 5 meter high tunnel. To walk into the city, you have to take the underground next to the station (beautiful old building in red) under the trains.

title: (08430) La Torreta - C-1415c
description: Repsol gas station with LPG

title: (17401) Arbúcies - GI-543
description: Water point just below the highway. We were told by locals it's potable water. You filled yourself a lot of bottles.

title: (08302) Mataró - 80 Carrer Pablo Iglesias
description: Tree-lined street with shade and many parking spaces, some completely flat. It is located next to the soccer field near the Mossos de Escuadra police station and at the end of the Can Boada polygon. A few meters away we find the Roman site of Torre Llaurader. It is a quiet area with many trees and parks to walk the dog. It is close to the residential area with supermarkets, bars, etc, and about 500m from the beach. At night there is always parking. I don't recommend weekends because they come to have a bottle.
